aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.descricao: Full Stack Developer with extensive experience in ReactJS, JavaScript, Python, Java, C#, SQL, and APIs. I am passionate about finding innovative solutions that enhance the work environment. I have solid experience in developing automations (RPA), always focusing on reusable and easy-to-understand methodologies. I am currently studying Systems Analysis and Development.
